name: Pay To Win (Myoji)
description:
A musical Shootter made during Juice Jam II.

Let's Juice, but with MUSIC !

The Game is pretty simple. Avoid being hit by deadly tomatoes and beat the rythm at he same times. Each note correctly beaten grant you one gold. You need 50 golds to buy your victory.

Teams :

Myoji : Game Design, Programming.

Ricardo : Game Design, Programming.

Marc : Game design, Musics.

Chantal & Bilel : Game Design

Special thanks to Elayan, Gaetan, Romaric, Lorenzo & Gilbert.
